title: Avustralyadan bir enstantane...
creator_credit: Bayram Ocal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Bayram Ocal reflects on his many achievements since migrating to Australia in the late sixties, including contributing to the foundation of a Turkish Islamic society, an Islamic funeral service, a mosque and various Turkish language newspapers.
creator_credit_for_label: Bayram Ocal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
